00011 #include "Jamoma.h"
00012 #include "scheduler.h"
00013 
00014 static t_symbol *ps_granularity;
00015 static t_symbol *ps_clock;
00016 
00017 
00018 t_scheduler*    create(rampunit_method_callback_type in_callback, void *in_baton)
00019 {
00020         t_atom argv;
00021         
00022         t_scheduler *rampunit = (t_scheduler *)malloc(sizeof(t_scheduler));
00023         if(rampunit){
00024                 ps_granularity = gensym("granularity");                                                 // cache attr names for speed
00025                 ps_clock = gensym("clock");
00026 
00027                 rampunit->callback = in_callback;
00028                 rampunit->baton = in_baton;
00029                 rampunit->max_clock = clock_new(rampunit, (method)&tick);               // install the max timer
00030                 rampunit->numvalues = 0;
00031                 rampunit->value_current = NULL;
00032                 rampunit->value_target = NULL;
00033                 rampunit->stepsize = NULL;
00034                 rampunit->function = NULL;
00035                 rampunit->functionName = NULL;
00036                 setnumvalues(rampunit, 1);
00037                 rampunit->value_current[0] = 0;
00038 
00039                 atom_setfloat(&argv,20.0);
00040                 attrset(rampunit, ps_granularity, 1, &argv);
00041                 setFunction(rampunit, gensym("linear"));
00042         }
00043         return rampunit;
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 void destroy(t_scheduler *rampunit)
00048 {
00049         clock_unset(rampunit->max_clock);
00050         freeobject((t_object *)rampunit->max_clock);
00051         free(rampunit->value_current);
00052         free(rampunit->value_target);
00053         free(rampunit->value_start);
00054         if(rampunit->function)
00055                 delete rampunit->function;
00056         free(rampunit);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 JamomaError setFunction(t_scheduler *rampunit, t_symbol *functionName)
00061 {
00062         JamomaError     err = JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00063         if(functionName != rampunit->functionName){
00064                 err = jamoma_getFunction(functionName, &rampunit->function);
00065                 if(!err){
00066                         rampunit->functionName = functionName;
00067                 }
00068         }
00069         return err;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 JamomaError getFunction(t_scheduler *rampunit, t_symbol **functionName)
00074 {
00075         *functionName = rampunit->functionName;
00076         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00077 }

00080 JamomaError setFunctionParameter(t_scheduler *rampunit, t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00081 {
00082         return rampunit->function->setParameter(parameterName, argc, argv);
00083 }

00085 
00086 JamomaError getFunctionParameter(t_scheduler *rampunit, t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00087 {
00088         return rampunit->function->getParameter(parameterName, argc, argv);
00089 }

00091 
00092 ramp_err attrset(t_scheduler *rampunit, t_symbol *attrname, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00093 {
00094         if(attrname == ps_granularity)
00095                 {
00096                         if (argc)
00097                                 rampunit->granularity = atom_getfloat(argv);
00098                         // Should there be a minimum threshold for granularity?
00099                 }
00100         else if (attrname == ps_clock) {
00101                 // The below copied from the SDK
00102                 
00103                 /*
00104                 void *old = x->m_setclock->s_thing; 
00105                 void *c = 0;
00106                 */
00107 
00108                 /* the line below can be restated as: 
00109                 if s is the empty symbol 
00110                 or s->s_thing is zero 
00111                 or s->s_thing is non-zero and a setclock object 
00112                 */ 
00113                 /*
00114                 if ((s == gensym("")) || ((c = s->s_thing) && zgetfn(c,&s_unset))) 
00115                 { 
00116                         if (old) 
00117                                 setclock_unset(old,x->m_clock); 
00118                         x->m_setclock = s;                                              // s is a t_symbol *
00119                         if (x->m_running) 
00120                                 setclock_delay(c,x->m_clock,0L); 
00121                 }
00122                 */
00123                 post("Tutten betutten");
00124         }
00125                 
00126         else
00127                 return RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID;
00128 
00129         return RAMP_ERR_NONE;
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 ramp_err attrget(t_scheduler *rampunit, t_symbol *attrname, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00134 {
00135         if(attrname == ps_granularity) {
00136                 *argv = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom));
00137                 *argc = 1;
00138                 atom_setfloat(*argv,rampunit->granularity);     
00139         }               
00140         else if (attrname == ps_clock) {
00141                 // something
00142         }
00143         else {
00144                 *argc = 0;
00145                 return RAMP_ERR_ATTR_INVALID;
00146         }
00147 
00148         return RAMP_ERR_NONE;
00149 }

00151 
00152 //void go(t_scheduler *rampunit, float value, double time)
00153 void go(t_scheduler *rampunit, short numvalues, double *values, double time)
00154 {
00155         short   i;
00156 
00157         rampunit->ramptime = time;
00158         rampunit->numgrains = rampunit->ramptime / rampunit->granularity;
00159         rampunit->stepsize = 1.0 / rampunit->numgrains;
00160 
00161         setnumvalues(rampunit, numvalues);
00162         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++){
00163                 rampunit->value_target[i] = values[i];
00164                 rampunit->value_start[i] = rampunit->value_current[i];
00165         }
00166         rampunit->value = 0.0;                                                  // set the ramp to the beginning
00167         setclock_fdelay(NULL, rampunit->max_clock, 0);  // start now
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 //void set(t_scheduler *rampunit, double value)
00172 void set(t_scheduler *rampunit, short numvalues, double *values)
00173 {
00174         short i;
00175 
00176         clock_unset(rampunit->max_clock);
00177         setnumvalues(rampunit, numvalues);
00178         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++)
00179                 rampunit->value_current[i] = values[i];
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 void stop(t_scheduler *rampunit)
00184 {
00185         clock_unset(rampunit->max_clock);
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 void tick(t_scheduler *rampunit)
00190 {
00191         short   i;
00192         double  mapped;
00193         double  *current = rampunit->value_current;
00194         double  *target = rampunit->value_target;
00195         double  *start = rampunit->value_start;
00196 
00197         // 1. go to the the next step in our ramp
00198         rampunit->numgrains--;
00199         if(rampunit->numgrains == 0){
00200                 for(i=0; i < rampunit->numvalues; i++)
00201                         rampunit->value_current[i] = rampunit->value_target[i];
00202         }
00203         else{
00204                 rampunit->value += rampunit->stepsize;
00205                 mapped = rampunit->function->mapValue(rampunit->value);
00206                 for(i=0; i < rampunit->numvalues; i++)
00207                         current[i] = start[i] + ((target[i] - start[i]) * mapped);
00208         }
00209         
00210         // 2. send the value to the host
00211         (rampunit->callback)(rampunit->baton, rampunit->numvalues, rampunit->value_current);
00212 
00213         // 3. set the clock to fire again
00214         if(rampunit->numgrains)
00215                 setclock_fdelay(NULL, rampunit->max_clock, rampunit->granularity);
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 // PRIVATE METHOD: memory allocation
00220 void setnumvalues(t_scheduler *rampunit, short numvalues)
00221 {
00222         if(numvalues != rampunit->numvalues){
00223                 if(rampunit->numvalues == 0){
00224                         rampunit->value_start = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00225                         rampunit->value_current = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00226                         rampunit->value_target = (double *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(double));
00227                 }
00228                 else{
00229                         rampunit->value_start = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_start, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00230                         rampunit->value_current = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_current, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00231                         rampunit->value_target = (double *)realloc(rampunit->value_target, numvalues * sizeof(double));
00232                 }
00233                 rampunit->numvalues = numvalues;
00234         }       
00235 }
